title: About Company
description: Learn more about Skloresurs company. Our mission and values.

mainhero.title: Skloresurs
mainhero.content: - has 17 years of experience in the field of architectural and interior glazing. Based on modern technologies, we create high-quality products that meet all international quality standards. Cooperation with world leaders in the production of glass and equipment, professionalism and highly advanced systems make it possible to implement the most daring design and architectural solutions.

content.p1: Modern glass processing technologies for the realization of your dreams.
content.p2: Look at the world with pleasure!

certificates.h2: The quality of our company's products is tested by the German Institute IFT Rosenheim

data.content:
Glass cut with functions (Low-e and laminated glass) 4 lines:
max 3210 mm x 6000 mm

Automated double glazing lines with gas filling functions:
  • Structural double -glazed windows
  • 1 -, 2 -, 3 -chamber double glazing up to 100 mm thick:
    max 3210 mm x 6000 mm
  • Hunted double-glazed windows (1-, 2-chamber):
    max 3300 mm x 4500 mm

Digital technology of full color printing with ceramic paint:
max 2800 mm x 6000 mm

Quenching all kinds of glass 5 lines:
max 3300 mm x 6000 mm - hardening
max 3300 mm x 4500 mm - bend
HST (Heat Soak Test) - Nickel Sulfide Sulfide Detection Test

Trymphallexation (hardened, bent, smart, warm and others):
max 2900 mm x 5900 mm

Sandblasting of glass (solid and decorative):
max 2600 mm x 3000 mm

All kinds of glass processing:
PE, GE, SE, BEM
- complex cutouts and holes (Water Jet):
max 2500 mm x 5000 mm

info.title: Locations
info.description: We have 2 production facilities located in the cities of Dubno, Rivne region, and Tlumach, Ivano-Frankivsk region. These facilities are strategically important for our company and enable us to provide high-quality products to our clients in these regions.

info.title: Total Production Area
info.description: Our total production area is an impressive 17,600 square meters. This large and modern infrastructure allows us to manufacture a significant quantity of products with high quality.

info.title: Employees
info.description: We have over 300 highly skilled employees in our team who are dedicated to their work. Their professionalism and commitment guarantee high-quality solutions and service for you.

info.title: Products per Month
info.description: Our capacity allows us to produce more than 50,000 square meters of products every month. This means we can fulfill even the largest orders and deliver our clients' products on time.

info.title: Varieties of Glass in Stock
info.description: We have over 60 varieties of glass available in our warehouse. This provides our clients with the opportunity to choose from a wide range of options and find the optimal solutions for their needs.

info.title: Projects
info.description: Every year, we develop and implement over 200 projects. Our experience and technical knowledge help us bring our clients' most ambitious ideas to life and achieve mutual success.
